description: Detects the use of getsystem Meterpreter/Cobalt Strike command by detecting a specific service starting
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov
Ecco
Florian Roth
false_positives: Commandlines containing components like cmd accidentally
Jobs and services started with cmd
name: Potential Meterpreter/CobaltStrike Activity
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\services.exe" AND (((process.command_line.text:"*\/c*" AND process.command_line.text:"*echo*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\pipe\\*" AND process.command_line.text:("*cmd*" OR "*%COMSPEC%*"))) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*rundll32*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.dll,a*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/p\:*")))) AND (NOT process.command_line.text:"*MpCmdRun*"))
